trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when something has gone wrong during remoting.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod når noe er feil under ekstern kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: RemotingException uses the HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING, which has the value 0x8013150B.
trans-unit.target: RemotingException bruker HRESULT COR_E_REMOTING, som har verdien 0x8013150B.

trans-unit.source: RemotingException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: RemotingException bruker standard <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>implementering, som støtter referanse likhet.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of RemotingException, see the RemotingException constructors.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av RemotingException, kan du se RemotingException konstruktører.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"> </xref> klasse standardegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>arver fra <xref:System.SystemException>klasse.</xref:System.SystemException></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The empty string ("")|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av klassen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| En tom streng ("") |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt melding.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>arver fra <xref:System.SystemException>klasse.</xref:System.SystemException></xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> class: |Property Type|Condition| |-------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The `message` string|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av klassen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>: | Egenskapstype | Betingelse | |-------------------|---------------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Den `message` streng |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class from serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"> </xref> klassen fra serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: (For more information on serialization, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).)
trans-unit.target: (Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om serialisering, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).)

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet for unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The info parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The info parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception will include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak inkluderer en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen returnerer den samme verdien som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException> class: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av klassen <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Referansen for det indre unntaket. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingException>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket oppstod.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `InnerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `InnerException` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
